## Overview

<p>Tools for creating interactive command line tools.</p>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { parseArgs } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/cli/parse-args"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { assertEquals } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/assert"</span>;

<span class="pl-c">// Same as running `deno run example.ts --foo --bar=baz ./quux.txt`</span>
<span class="pl-k">const</span> args <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-en">parseArgs</span>([<span class="pl-s">"--foo"</span>, <span class="pl-s">"--bar=baz"</span>, <span class="pl-s">"./quux.txt"</span>]);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(args, { <span class="pl-c1">foo</span>: <span class="pl-c1">true</span>, <span class="pl-c1">bar</span>: <span class="pl-s">"baz"</span>, <span class="pl-c1">_</span>: [<span class="pl-s">"./quux.txt"</span>] });
